author: tigerinus
body:
## Steps to reproduce

```powershell
# step 1 - run and cancel after like 3 seconds
Update-Module

# step 2 - because I want to check the module versions first
Get-Module

#step 3 - re-run
Update-Module
```

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7172560/87889037-bb081780-c9fd-11ea-908f-a1ee275cc63c.png)

## Expected behavior

Update-Module to run successfully

## Actual behavior

see the screenshot above


## Workaround
Exit `pwsh`, re-enter `pwsh` and re-run `Update-Module`.

(Based on this workaround, it looks like `Update-Module` leaves some states persisted in PS runtime after getting interrupted)
